```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(gediamazonia)

```
```{r}
data(roads)
data(studyarea)
```

```{r}
p <- ggplot() + geom_sf(data = studyarea$np, fill = "grey") +   geom_sf(data = studyarea$buffer, fill = "grey90") +   geom_sf(data = studyarea$cacao_zone, color = "black", fill = "transparent") +  geom_sf(data = studyarea$aoi, color = "black", fill = "transparent") +
  geom_sf(data = roads, aes(color = grp)) +
  theme_linedraw()


ggsave(p, filename = here::here("data/study_area.png"), height = 4,
       width = 4, dpi = 300)
```
